pageOptions.customHeadersDesc: Add custom HTTP headers to requests

pageOptions.extractMainDesc: Extract only the main content area
pageOptions.ignoreRenderingDesc: Skip JavaScript rendering (faster, but may miss dynamic content)

pageOptions.includeHtmlDesc: Include raw HTML in the results
pageOptions.includeLinksDesc: Extract all links from the page

pageOptions.timeoutTooltip: Maximum time to wait for page load (seconds)

pageOptions.waitTimeTooltip: Time to wait after page load before extracting (milliseconds)

spiderOptions.allowedDomainsTooltip: Comma-separated list of domains to crawl (e.g., example.com, sub.example.com)
spiderOptions.concurrentRequestsHelp: Number of simultaneous requests (higher = faster but more resource intensive)
spiderOptions.concurrentRequestsTooltip: Maximum number of concurrent requests to make
spiderOptions.freeProxyAccess: Free plan includes basic proxy access
spiderOptions.maxDepthTooltip: Maximum crawl depth (0 = only start URL, 1 = start URL + direct links, etc.)
spiderOptions.needProxy: Need a proxy for specific requirements?
spiderOptions.pageLimitTooltip: Maximum number of pages to crawl (0 = unlimited)
spiderOptions.pathFiltersDesc: Include or exclude specific URL paths
spiderOptions.premiumProxyAccess: Upgrade to Startup or higher for premium proxy access
spiderOptions.proxyServerTooltip: Select a proxy server to route requests through

configuration.title: Activate Google Custom Search
configuration.description: To enable the search playground, you need to configure Google Custom Search Engine (CSE) credentials. WaterCrawl uses these to perform searches via the Google API.

step1.title: Step 1: Get Your Credentials
step1.description: Obtain your API Key and CSE ID from Google Cloud Console and the Programmable Search Engine control panel.

step2.title: Step 2: Update Configuration
step2.description: Add the following lines to the .env file located in the backend root directory of your project:
step2.note: Replace the placeholder values with your actual credentials.

step3.title: Step 3: Restart Backend
step3.description: After saving the .env file, restart your backend server for the changes to be applied.

betaNotice.description: The Knowledge Base feature is currently in beta. We may introduce changes, improvements, or modifications to functionality, data structures, or API endpoints in future updates. While we strive to maintain backward compatibility, please be aware that some changes might affect existing knowledge bases or require migration steps.
betaNotice.feedback: We appreciate your feedback and testing during this beta period to help us improve the feature.
betaNotice.title: Beta Feature

delete.confirmError: Please enter the correct knowledge base title to confirm deletion
delete.confirmPrompt: Please type the knowledge base title {{title}} to confirm:
delete.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge base?
delete.inputLabel: Type knowledge base title to confirm
delete.title: Delete Knowledge Base
delete.warningMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the knowledge base {{title}} and remove all associated documents and chunks.

detail.archivedMessage: This knowledge base is archived and is in view-only mode. You cannot add new documents or make changes.
detail.notFound: Knowledge base not found or you don't have access to it.

documentDetail.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.
documentDetail.errorDetails: The document could not be processed. Error details:
documentDetail.noChunks: No chunks found for this document.
documentDetail.processingMessage: The content is being chunked and indexed. This may take a few moments. The page will refresh automatically.

documents.getStarted: Get started by importing a new document.
documents.retrySuccess: Successfully started re-indexing for failed documents.
documents.title: Title

chunking.automaticTooltip: When enabled, chunk overlap will be automatically set to 20% of chunk size
chunking.chunkOverlapHelp: Number of characters to overlap between chunks to maintain context.
chunking.chunkSizeHelp: Number of characters per chunk. Recommended: 1000-1500 characters.
chunking.description: Proper text chunking is essential for effective information retrieval. Chunks should be large enough to capture context but small enough for precise matching.
chunking.title: Chunking Configuration

embedding.description: Embeddings convert text into numerical vectors for semantic search. Choose whether to enable embeddings for your knowledge base.
embedding.modelHelp: Select the embedding model to use for this knowledge base.
embedding.providerConfigHelp: Select the provider configuration for embeddings.
embedding.semanticDescription: Enable embeddings to convert text into vectors for semantic similarity search.
embedding.textOnlyDescription: Skip embeddings for a lighter setup. Search will be based on exact text matching only.
embedding.title: Embedding Configuration

form.subtitle: Configure your knowledge base settings for optimal information retrieval.

summarization.contextHelp: Provide additional context to guide the summarization process.
summarization.contextRequired: Context is required for context-aware summarization
summarization.description: Enhance each chunk with AI-generated summaries to improve search relevance. This adds cost but can significantly improve retrieval quality.
summarization.disabledDescription: Skip summarization to minimize costs. Search will use raw chunk text only.
summarization.enabledDescription: Add AI-generated summaries to each chunk for improved search quality.
summarization.modelHelp: Select the LLM model for generating summaries.
summarization.providerConfigHelp: Select the provider configuration for summarization.
summarization.temperatureHelp: Controls randomness in generation. Lower values (0.0-0.3) are more focused and deterministic, higher values (0.7-1.0) are more creative.
summarization.title: Summarization Configuration

banner.message: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience.

modal.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can manage your preferences below.

necessary.name: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.name: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to provide more relevant advertising and content.
